channel.title: This is Pissing me Off
channel.description:
K so Me and my friend are trying to connect to each other on XBL. We both have Moderate NAT's, but im trying to get it Open.
I went to 192.168.0.1, but i can not find UPnP.
I have a d-link router..
Can anybody help?

item.title: This is Pissing me Off
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

MistaBigBoss:

I don’t know what you’re talking about but NAT is used by single router for a single local network. You can’t connect private IP’s from different NATs to eachother because that would mean connecting computers from different LANs with eachother over their private IP’s, in your case you must use the public IP for making the connecting between different routers.

Fixed it, sorry lol what i said was a little confusing…

Read full topic
